General.Name: Ajusteel Co. Ltd.
General.Description: AJUSTEEL Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells steel products in South Korea and internationally. Its products portfolio includes color steel plates under the Texteel, SUsilke, and Silk names; layer structures, including products with enhanced metal-copper clad laminate; and fire doors, wallsteel panels, louvers, glass products, partitions, and half-finished goods for elevators and escalators under the Atex brand name. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Gumi, South Korea.
